author: niallp
msg: Create a copy of Lang 2.6 repackaged to "org.apache.commons.lang3" - can be used to run CLIRR against Lang 3.0 to see whats really been added/removed

msg: CAMEL-3576: Don't use task executor for reply manager as spring DMLC is a bit pants when using thread pools.
